name: Vessel (itch) (HectorC_Productions)
description: The game VESSEL is a simple button clicker which lets the player create a lifeform. The game is straightforward in which the player has to make careful decision on what route they specifically want to go through. This game uses a song called "Truce" by one of my favorite bands Twenty One Pilots which I've changed the sounds to create the mood for the game. The concept and metaphor of the game was inspired by the game Deltarune by Toby Fox, in which at the beginning of the game, the game tells you directly that your choices don't matter.
